prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Guitar, Drums, Piano, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Drums, Bass, and Guitar, but no Brass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Guitar, Drums, and Piano, excluding Brass.

Style 3:
No Brass is included in this song, which is made up of Piano, Drums, Bass, and Guitar.
